PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 1998-22291998-12-160,  ,  ,  HERITAGE, 
PrecisApproval of the reappointment by the Minister of Canadian Heritage of ROBERT J. OJOLICK, of Sydney, Nova Scotia, as a trustee of the Board of Trustees of the Canadian Museum of Civilization to hold office during pleasure for a term of three years, effective January 23, 1999.
